attributes.action: apprenticeships if your 21 or over then you should get the national minimum wage
attributes.additional_details:
i want change for 18-21 and change for 21 and over in a apprenticeship 
how can anyone live on 3.30 per hour it's ridiculous
attributes.background: 3.30 is just not enough to live on if your 21 and over you should get at least the national minimum wage 6.70 if your in a apprenticeship how are you suppose to live on that it's just not enough once you've been there for a short while you have some idea of what your suppose to do to earn your wage.
